code: import axios from'axios';var GetMessageRequest=function GetMessageRequest(){return{type:'GET_MESSAGE_REQUEST'};};var GetMessageSuccess=function GetMessageSuccess(data){return{type:'GET_MESSAGE_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var GetMessageError=function GetMessageError(err){return{type:'GET_MESSAGE_ERROR',payload:err};};export var GetMessage=function GetMessage(userToken,id,id_user){return function(dispatch){dispatch(GetMessageRequest());return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"message/?id_chatroom=").concat(id,"&id_user=").concat(id_user),{headers:{'user-token':userToken}}).then(function(res){dispatch(GetMessageSuccess(res.data.data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(GetMessageError(err.message));});};};var SendMessageRequest=function SendMessageRequest(){return{type:'SEND_MESSAGE_REQUEST'};};var SendMessageSuccess=function SendMessageSuccess(data){return{type:'SEND_MESSAGE_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var SendMessageError=function SendMessageError(err){return{type:'SEND_MESSAGE_ERROR',payload:err};};export var SendMessage=function SendMessage(userToken,id_chatroom,id_participiant,formData){return function(dispatch){console.log('ini dari redux',formData);dispatch(SendMessageRequest());return axios({method:'POST',url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"message/:").concat(id_participiant,"?id_chatroom=").concat(id_chatroom,"&id_sender=").concat(id_participiant),headers:{'user-token':userToken},data:formData}).then(function(res){console.log(formData);dispatch(SendMessageSuccess(res.data));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.response);SendMessageError(err);});};};
